notes: Mitochondria data has been released in the neuprint+ data model. More details will be provided in an upcoming paper.
neuprint+ is backwards compatible with neuprint but some features involving mitochondria and sub-cellular search might not work with older releases

Re-organizes cell types: increases the number of neurons with neuron type classification and provides more robust morphology and connectivity based groupings (note: some neurons are in different groups than in v1.0)

Systematically applies 'final' names to neuron cell types.  There are no longer *_pct types; all cell types are ‘final’.  In some cases, we provide synonyms or other notes in the neuprint field called ‘notes’.
Some QC was applied to various neuronal pathways, particularly those with low connection weights
Boundary between FB and BU(R) has been adjusted to reflect neuron innervating patterns
Boundaries of EB and FB subareas have been refined
AL glomeruli are added (only those identifiable in the dataset)
